thread.title: Coming Distractions: Zac Efron salutes America in Baywatch’s Super Bowl trailer
thread.title_full: Coming Distractions: Zac Efron salutes America in Baywatch’s Super Bowl trailer

author: Sam Barsanti
title: Coming Distractions: Zac Efron salutes America in Baywatch’s Super Bowl trailer
text:
Share Tweet 
Dwayne Johnson has been having a good Super Bowl, at least in the sense that he’s had two trailers premiere tonight with still some more football to go. Maybe he’ll go for the hat-trick and we’ll see a little bit of Jumanji ? Anyway, a new Baywatch trailer aired during the Super Bowl, and though not all of it was new, we do get to see Zac Efron’s extremely patriotic crotch area. It’s unclear if this teaser was specifically designed to capitalize on the similarly patriotic nature of Lady Gaga’s halftime show , but it’s a nice surprise either way—especially for people who like to see the American flag represented in both stars and banana hammocks. 
Baywatch will be in theaters on May 26.
